text: Please consider paying a bit more to stay at a better hotel. Otherwise, your entire trip might be spoiled by the unpleasant experience of staying at this one. It is the worst hotel.
Worst ever hotel... Pls don't goo.... Before using one also not clean... Ac or fan anything not working... For money this is worst hotel ever in the world

Not worth the price u pay!!!!!
The hotel was very average, no water freely available ...only 2 Waterbottles per room, safe for female travellers(not solo though), very small rooms and the bathroom is terribly small ... The location is very convineant though...
I recommend to invest a bit more money for some better hotel

Room dirty and noise because nearby road that horn sound whole night / translucent curtain.

one good thing here is good reception staff, nice guy.

If anyone wants to stay nearby little india, please move to chinatown or bugis ororchard so much better.
